TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 526-527
TEI.2.document_author: Warren D C Hall and James R Phelps
TEI.2.document_title: Warren D C Hall and James R Phelps to Stephen F Austin, 11-01-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Inventory and appraisement of partnership of John and James Austin, November 1, 1830.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 526-527

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Inventory and appraisement of partnership of John and James Austin, November 1, 1830.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Report of *person_mentioned*Appraisers*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The undersigned called upon by*person_mentioned* Col Stephen F. Aus[tin]*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Capt. John Austin*/person_mentioned* to estimate certain property be[long]ing to the said *person_mentioned*John Austin and the Estate of [the] late James B. Austin */person_mentioned*deceased have on this *date_mentioned n="11-01-1830">first [day] of November in the year 1830*/date_mentioned* proceeded as follo[ws]:*/p*
*p*Thirteen head of horses mares and colts appraised at--------------------$475.00*/p*
*p*Twelve cows and calves apprd. at—--------------------------------------------- 120.00*/p*
*p*Eight Two year old horned cattle apprd----------------------------—-------- 56.00*/p*
*p*Four yearlins apprd at-----------------------------—----------------— 20. 00*/p*
*p*Two bulls apprd. at-----—----- 20.00*/p*
*p*One yoke of oxen at---------------------------——------------------—----- 50.00*/p*
*p*The stock of hogs, supprd. to be forty, apprd—------------------------ 80.00*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*House and out buildings at the Prairie*/location_mentioned* appd----- 225.00*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*gin house */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*cotton gin*/location_mentioned*, as it stands, apprd. at----------------140.00*/p*
*p*The cleared *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*and enclosure apprd. at-------------------------------------- 150. 00*/p*
*p*Having closed said estimation we have herewith Signed in presence of*person_mentioned* Robert M. Williams*/person_mentioned* [on] and *person_mentioned*Robert Martin*/person_mentioned* the *date_mentioned n="11-01-1830">day and year first above writin.*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Warren D. C. Hall*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*James E. Phelps*/person_mentioned* */p*
*p*In presence of *person_mentioned*R M Williamson*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Robt. Martin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
